snippet: The general and his men are accused of carrying out killings, torture and drugs and arms trafficking in Chihuahua State.
abstract: Mexican Gen Manuel de Jesus Moreno Avina and his subordinates are charged in military court with systematically ordering the killings of at least seven civilians in Chihuahua State; case stems from events in 2008 and 2009 and may be one of the most serious reports of human rights abuses since Mexico began fighting drug gangs.
lead_paragraph: The general and his men are accused of carrying out killings, torture and drugs and arms trafficking in Chihuahua State.

headline.seo: Mexican General and Troops Charged in Border Town Atrocities
headline.main: Mexican General Is Charged in Killings and Abuses
headline.print_headline: Mexican General Is Charged in Killings and Other Abuses

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
